Not only in "Never Say Never" missing, so is the original "Casino Royale."  

This is far from being the complete collector's edition.

As neil1966hardy said...

Never Say Never Again + Casino Royale (Original) are NOT official Bond movies... they were made by a different company and are not classed as "real" Bond movies.

Thats why you dont see them in box sets or torrents unless specifically mentioned... so this IS the COMPLETE set.
